exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: destruct (Nat.eq_dec (boundedSearchHelp (P (S b)) b) b) as [H1 | H1].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros P b x H. unfold boundedSearch in H. unfold boundedSearchHelp in H. destruct b. - discriminate H. - simpl in H. destruct (Nat.eq_dec (boundedSearchHelp (P (S b)) b) b) as [H1 | H1]. + destruct (Nat.eq_dec (P (S b) b)) as [H2 | H2]. * discriminate H. * reflexivity. + apply H.
